DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore effectiveness Gulf War Health Education ( GWHE ) iRest Yoga Nidra ( meditation ) /auricular ( ear ) acupuncture Veterans Gulf War Veterans ' Illnesses ( GWVI ) .
DOC.brief_title: CAM Veterans With Gulf War Illnesses
DOC.detailed_description: Gulf War Veterans report irritable bowel syndrome , chronic fatigue , musculoskeletal pain , sleep difficulty , neurocognitive dysfunction ( example , concentration , memory , attention problem ) . The effective treatment approach appear broad spectrum problem find GWVI may require complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) approach enhance positive outcome . Mindfulness meditation acupuncture broad spectrum CAM treatment design target multiple biological system simultaneously , thus may well suit GWVI . Gulf War Health Education group promote wellness prevention utilize proactive patient care model .
DOC.criteria: U.S . Veteran Deployed Gulf War 19901991 Currently suffers Gulf War Veterans ' Illness ( i.e . fatigue , pain , cognitive impairment ) Addiction drug alcohol Experiences hallucination delusion Currently manic Currently suicidal Hearing difficulty would interfere group participation Current involvement meditation acupuncture group
